original_text: He can draw pictures of beautiful things that he wants to make. He can use gold, silver and bronze to make them. He can draw pictures of beautiful things that he wants to make. sentences.original_text: He can draw pictures of beautiful things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아름다운 것들의 그림을 그릴 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: silver and bronze to make them
